com.github.mikephil.charting.interfaces

Interface ChartInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BarDataProvider, BarLineScatterCandleBubbleDataProvider, BubbleDataProvider, CandleDataProvider, LineDataProvider, ScatterDataProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarChart, BarLineChartBase, BubbleChart, CandleStickChart, Chart, CombinedChart, HorizontalBarChart, LineChart, PieChart, PieRadarChartBase, RadarChart, ScatterChart

    public interface ChartInterface
    Interface that provides everything there is to know about the dimensions, bounds, and range of the chart.
